text: @IvankaTrump Rep Congressman Guy Reschenthaler spoke out against Nancy Pelosi over the weekend, telling Breitbart News that the Speaker would rather investigate President Trump than investigate China for spreading the coronavirus throughout the world which has killed thousands of people
